data.name: No
data.comment: Various uses of no (AntProperties.cs)

data.name: SimulationPluginExcetionIntro
data.value: There was a problem during runtime: {0}
data.comment: common intro for all exception-messageboxes (TeamSetup.cs) 0: Exceptionmessage

data.name: SimulationPluginKicklistEntry
data.comment: Pattern for one Entry of kicklist-messagebox (TeamSetup.cs) 0: Colony-Name 1: Filename 2: Classname 3: Authorname

data.name: SimulationPluginKicklistHead
data.value: The following colonies are not valid anymore:
data.comment: Header for the kicklist-messagebox (TeamSetup.cs)

data.name: SimulationPluginMessageBoxTitle
data.comment: Caption of every Messagebox (TeamSetup.cs)

data.name: SimulationPluginRightsLocked
data.value: Following rights are not granted in the settings:
data.comment: Header of a list of not granted rights (RightsRequest.cs)

data.name: SimulationPluginRuleViolation
data.value: This colony creates a ruleViolation with current settings: {0}
data.comment: Is used to show errormessage in listview-Tooltip (TeamSetup.cs) 0: Message of RuleViolation

data.name: SimulatorPluginAntPropertiesAuthorFormat
data.comment: Format of author-tag (AntProperties.cs) 0: First Name 1: Last Name

data.name: SimulatorPluginAntPropertiesDbAccess
data.comment: To tell the user, that the ant needs DB-Access (AntProperties.cs)

data.name: SimulatorPluginAntPropertiesIoAccess
data.comment: To tell the user, that the ant needs IO-Access (AntProperties.cs)

data.name: SimulatorPluginAntPropertiesNetAccess
data.comment: To tell the user, that the ant needs Network-Access (AntProperties.cs)

data.name: SimulatorPluginAntPropertiesNoAccess
data.comment: To tell the user, that the ant needs no Access (AntProperties.cs)

data.name: SimulatorPluginAntPropertiesNoAdditionalInfos
data.comment: Text, if there are no additional info to access-requests (AntProperties.cs)

data.name: SimulatorPluginAntPropertiesRefAccess
data.value: Ant references external assembly or assemblies.
data.comment: To tell the user, that the ant needs Ref-Access (AntProperties.cs)

data.name: SimulatorPluginAntPropertiesTitle
data.comment: Title-Bar of ant-property-window (AntProperties.cs) 0: Folkname

data.name: SimulatorPluginAntPropertiesUiAccess
data.comment: To tell the user, that the ant needs UI-Access (AntProperties.cs)

data.name: SimulatorPluginAntPropertiesUnknown
data.comment: Unknown information at filesize and filecreationtime (AntProperties.cs)

data.name: SimulatorPluginDescription
data.comment: Description of Simulator-Application (SimulatorPlugin.cs)

data.name: SimulatorPluginName
data.comment: Name of Simulator-Application (SimulatorPlugin.cs)

data.name: SimulatorPluginNotStarted
data.comment: Try to get a state, but simulation is not running (SimulatorPlugin.cs)

data.name: SimulatorPluginTeamSetupFileloadException
data.value: The file {0} coun't be loaded. The detailed errormessage is '{1}'
data.comment: Errormessage for Exceptions during the load of new AIs (TeamSetup.cs) 0: filename 1: inner exception-message

data.name: SimulatorPluginTeamSetupNoFolksFound
data.value: In the file {0} was no AI found.
data.comment: the file has no valid folks inside. (TeamSetup.cs) 0: filename

data.name: SimulatorPluginTeamSetupStillLoaded
data.value: The file {0} contains AI, but they are already contained in the list.
data.comment: the file, which should be loaded, has only still loaded folks (TeamSetup.cs) 0: Filename

data.name: StatisticPluginDescription
data.comment: Description of Statistic-Plugin (StatisticPlugin.cs)

data.name: StatisticPluginName
data.comment: Name of Statistic-Plugin (StatisticPlugin.cs)

data.name: Yes
data.comment: Various uses of yes (AntProperties.cs)
